entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 10:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
